changes.change: Fixed Genius/BehindTheLyrics hiding option
Arm64e (A12/A12x) support should be added (iirc, Cephei doesnt currently support Arm64e)
Fixed Genius/BehindTheLyrics hiding option
Added artwork nect to songs in playlist option
Tweak has been moved back into the Settings app
Hiding the device picker works in the new UI
Fixed the fullscreen album art for the new UI
Not sure if the hide Genius/BehindTheLyrics option works (at the moment)
Removed the Landscape rotation
Fixed the option to hide Genius/BehindTheLyrics
Hiding the device picker doesnt currently work in the new UI
Updated the preference bundle in the settings app (Cephei)
Update to make everything work
Tweak has moved inside the Spotify app (except for Followers/Following spoofer)
Added an option to spoof Followers/Following count
Pitch black now playing view
Landscape rotation for iPhone/iPod
(Kinda pointless) Anti-Jailbreak detection
Updated method for hiding the status bar
Initial Release
